publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1105 Brian Adam: Congratulations to the Young People of Middlefield for their Bus Shelter Artwork-That the Parliament congratulates the young people of Middlefield in Aberdeen for their high quality and innovative bus shelter artwork; notes the involvement of the Whitespace arts development team and PC John Ritchie in supporting and encouraging the activity; further notes that the costs are in line with current replacement screen costs, and commends the initiative to other local authorities for potential roll out across Scotland.

S2M-1105 Brian Adam: Congratulations to the Young People of Middlefield for their Bus Shelter Artwork-That the Parliament congratulates the young people of Middlefield in Aberdeen for their high quality and innovative bus shelter artwork; notes the involvement of the Whitespace arts development team and PC John Ritchie in supporting and encouraging the activity; further notes that the costs are in line with current replacement screen costs, and commends the initiative to other local authorities for potential roll out across Scotland.
S2M-1105 Congratulations to the Young People of Middlefield for their Bus Shelter Artwork (lodged on 25 March 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1105 Congratulations to the Young People of Middlefield for their Bus Shelter Artwork (lodged on 25 March 2004) Michael Matheson*

S2M-1105 Congratulations to the Young People of Middlefield for their Bus Shelter Artwork (lodged on 25 March 2004) Rob Gibson*, Alex Neil*, Fergus Ewing*, Alex Johnstone*, Richard Lochhead*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr David Davidson*
S2M-1105 Congratulations to the Young People of Middlefield for their Bus Shelter Artwork (lodged on 25 March 2004) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-1105 Congratulations to the Young People of Middlefield for their Bus Shelter Artwork (lodged on 25 March 2004) Shiona Baird*, Chris Ballance*, Ms Sandra White*, Robin Harper*

S2M-1105 Congratulations to the Young People of Middlefield for their Bus Shelter Artwork (lodged on 25 March 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
